titleStmt.title: The art of graveing and etching wherein is exprest the true way of graueing in copper : allso [sic] the manner & method of that famous Callot & Mr. Bosse in their seuerall ways of etching.
titleStmt.author: Faithorne, William, 1616-1691.

notesStmt.note: Title within engraved border; plates engraved by the author.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
